attributes.description:
The Toyota Hilux is built to tame any terrain you can throw at it, and with this 2.8 gd6 double cab you can do it while bringing your passengers along for the ride.  

Features of this vehicle include a Multi-Function Steering Wheel, Radio, Airbags, Electric Windows, Air-Conditioning with Dual Climate Control, Cruise Control, ABS, Bluetooth Connectivity, USB, AUX and much more! 

A 1% of the value of the vehicle non refundable deposit, secures the vehicle for two days. If that deposit lapses, You would be required to put another nonrefundable deposit to secure it further. Please be aware of scams with fraudsters using other advertiser’s photos. DO NOT pay any deposits unless you deal and pay deposits directly into Primo Executive Cars bank account!
attributes.finance_estimate:
Estimated monthly payment is R 9 850.00 over 72 months with 10% deposit of R 55 990.00 at a rate of 12% (PRIME + 3%).

* Please note that these calculations are only estimates and must be confirmed with your finance provider.
